title: FS P2 Sweet Cap. Huggins LL w/ red backing
author: Wite3

posts.post_title: FS P2 Sweet Cap. Huggins LL w/ red backing
posts.post_content:
P2 Sweet Caporal Pin Miller Huggins. Large Letter version. This is also the tougher red backing. See scans for condition. Nice pin.
For Sale $135 or best offer. Price Drop!

[IMG]http://i170.photobucket.com/albums/u266/Wite3/P2HugginsLLFront.jpg[/IMG]

The back is not actually blurry but my scanner is unhappy today. Very nice back.
[IMG]http://i170.photobucket.com/albums/u266/Wite3/P2HugginsLLBack_0002.jpg[/IMG]
